ds2.1.6:5.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, micchādiṭṭhi hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, micchāsamādhi hoti, vīriyabalaṃ hoti, samādhibalaṃ hoti, ahirikabalaṃ hoti, anottappabalaṃ hoti, lobho hoti, moho hoti, abhijjhā hoti, micchādiṭṭhi hoti, ahirikaṃ hoti, anottappaṃ hoti, samatho hoti, paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.6:5.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:6.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.6:7.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:8.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ—
ds2.1.6:9.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajā cetanā sañcetanā cetayitattaṃ—
ds2.1.6:10.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.6:11.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā micchāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.6:12.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cāro vicāro anuvicāro upavicāro cittassa anusandhānatā anupekkhanatā—
ds2.1.6:13.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye pīti pāmojjaṃ āmodanā pamodanā hāso pahāso vitti odagyaṃ attamanatā cittassa—
ds2.1.6:14.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:15.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:16.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ micchāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.6:17.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:18.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ mano mānasaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍaraṃ mano manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇakkhandho tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātu—
ds2.1.6:19.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ sātaṃ cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ sātaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā sātā sukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:20.2: Yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti yapanā yāpanā iriyanā vattanā pālanā jīvitaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ—
ds2.1.6:21.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho—
ds2.1.6:22.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā micchāsaṅkappo—
ds2.1.6:23.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ micchāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.6:24.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:25.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ micchāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.6:26.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:27.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hirīyati hiriyitabbena na hirīyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.6:28.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na ottappati ottappitabbena na ottappati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.6:29.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ sārāgo sārajjanā sārajjitattaṃ abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ—
ds2.1.6:30.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ anabhisamayo ananubodho asambodho appaṭivedho asaṅgāhanā apariyogāhanā asamapekkhanā apaccavekkhanā apaccakkhakammaṃ dummejjhaṃ bālyaṃ asampajaññaṃ moho pamoho sammoho avijjā avijjogho avijjāyogo avijjānusayo avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ avijjālaṅgī moho akusalamūlaṃ—
ds2.1.6:31.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ sārāgo sārajjanā sārajjitattaṃ abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ—
ds2.1.6:32.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāro diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaññojanaṃ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyāsaggāho—
ds2.1.6:33.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na hirīyati hiriyitabbena na hirīyati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.6:34.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye na ottappati ottappitabbena na ottappati pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā—
ds2.1.6:35.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:36.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabalaṃ micchāvāyāmo—
ds2.1.6:37.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibalaṃ micchāsamādhi—
ds2.1.6:37.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:38.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, pañcindriyāni honti, pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, cattāri balāni honti, dve hetū honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:38.3: ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.6:38.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:39.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi vīriyabalaṃ samādhibalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ lobho moho abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ samatho paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.6:39.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.6:39.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:40.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā … pe …
ds2.1.6:40.4: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:41.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, pīti hoti, sukhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, somanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, micchāsamādhi hoti, vīriyabalaṃ hoti, samādhibalaṃ hoti, ahirikabalaṃ hoti, anottappabalaṃ hoti, lobho hoti, moho hoti, abhijjhā hoti, ahirikaṃ hoti, anottappaṃ hoti, samatho hoti, paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.6:41.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:42.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, pañcindriyāni honti, pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, tivaṅgiko maggo hoti, cattāri balāni honti, dve hetū honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:42.3: ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.6:42.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:43.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi vīriyabalaṃ samādhibalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ lobho moho abhijjhā ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ samatho paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.6:43.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.6:43.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:44.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā … pe …
ds2.1.6:44.4: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:45.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, micchādiṭṭhi hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, micchāsamādhi hoti, vīriyabalaṃ hoti, samādhibalaṃ hoti, ahirikabalaṃ hoti, anottappabalaṃ hoti, lobho hoti, moho hoti, abhijjhā hoti, micchādiṭṭhi hoti, ahirikaṃ hoti, anottappaṃ hoti, samatho hoti, paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.6:45.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:46.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.6:47.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:47.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye vedanā hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:48.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:48.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye upekkhā hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:49.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ neva sātaṃ nāsātaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ adukkhamasukhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:49.3: idaṃ tasmiṃ samaye upekkhindriyaṃ hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:49.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:50.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, pañcindriyāni honti, caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, caturaṅgiko maggo hoti, cattāri balāni honti, dve hetū honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:50.3: ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.6:50.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:51.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi vīriyabalaṃ samādhibalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ lobho moho abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ samatho paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.6:51.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.6:51.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:52.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā … pe …
ds2.1.6:52.4: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …

ds2.1.6:54.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, pañcindriyāni honti, caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, tivaṅgiko maggo hoti, cattāri balāni honti, dve hetū honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …

ds2.1.6:56.4: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:57.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, dukkhaṃ hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, domanassindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, micchāsamādhi hoti, vīriyabalaṃ hoti, samādhibalaṃ hoti, ahirikabalaṃ hoti, anottappabalaṃ hoti, doso hoti, moho hoti, byāpādo hoti, ahirikaṃ hoti, anottappaṃ hoti, samatho hoti, paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.6:57.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:58.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.6:59.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye tajjāmanoviññāṇadhātusamphassajaṃ cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:59.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye vedanā hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:60.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:60.3: idaṃ tasmiṃ samaye dukkhaṃ hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:61.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cetasikaṃ asātaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetosamphassajaṃ asātaṃ dukkhaṃ vedayitaṃ cetosamphassajā asātā dukkhā vedanā—
ds2.1.6:61.3: idaṃ tasmiṃ samaye domanassindriyaṃ hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:62.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa—
ds2.1.6:62.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye doso hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:63.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpatti byāpajjanā byāpajjitattaṃ virodho paṭivirodho caṇḍikkaṃ asuropo anattamanatā cittassa—
ds2.1.6:63.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye byāpādo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:63.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:64.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, pañcindriyāni honti, caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, tivaṅgiko maggo hoti, cattāri balāni honti, dve hetū honti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:64.3: ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.6:64.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:65.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi vīriyabalaṃ samādhibalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ doso moho byāpādo ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ samatho paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.6:65.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.6:65.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:66.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārena rūpārammaṇaṃ vā … pe …
ds2.1.6:66.4: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe … avikkhepo hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:67.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, vīriyabalaṃ hoti, ahirikabalaṃ hoti, anottappabalaṃ hoti, vicikicchā hoti, moho hoti, ahirikaṃ hoti, anottappaṃ hoti, paggāho hoti;
ds2.1.6:67.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:68.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.6:68.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:69.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittassekaggatā hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:70.2: Yā tasmiṃ samaye kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṃ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṃ dvedhāpatho saṃsayo anekaṃsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā thambhitattaṃ cittassa manovilekho—
ds2.1.6:70.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye vicikicchā hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:70.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:71.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, cattāri indriyāni honti, caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, duvaṅgiko maggo hoti, tīṇi balāni honti, eko hetu hoti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:71.3: ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.6:71.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:72.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo vīriyabalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ vicikicchā moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ paggāho;
ds2.1.6:72.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.6:72.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:73.2: Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā … pe …
ds2.1.6:73.4: yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti, vedanā hoti, saññā hoti, cetanā hoti, cittaṃ hoti, vitakko hoti, vicāro hoti, upekkhā hoti, cittassekaggatā hoti, vīriyindriyaṃ hoti, samādhindriyaṃ hoti, manindriyaṃ hoti, upekkhindriyaṃ hoti, jīvitindriyaṃ hoti, micchāsaṅkappo hoti, micchāvāyāmo hoti, micchāsamādhi hoti, vīriyabalaṃ hoti, samādhibalaṃ hoti, ahirikabalaṃ hoti, anottappabalaṃ hoti, uddhaccaṃ hoti, moho hoti, ahirikaṃ hoti, anottappaṃ hoti, samatho hoti, paggāho hoti, avikkhepo hoti;
ds2.1.6:73.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:74.2: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṃ—
ds2.1.6:74.3: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti … pe ….
ds2.1.6:75.2: Yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye cittassa uddhaccaṃ avūpasamo cetaso vikkhepo bhantattaṃ cittassa—
ds2.1.6:75.3: idaṃ tasmiṃ samaye uddhaccaṃ hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:75.5: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:76.1: Tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā honti, dvāyatanāni honti, dve dhātuyo honti, tayo āhārā honti, pañcindriyāni honti, caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, tivaṅgiko maggo hoti, cattāri balāni honti, eko hetu hoti, eko phasso hoti … pe …
ds2.1.6:76.3: ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti, ekā dhammadhātu hoti;
ds2.1.6:76.4: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.6:77.2: Phasso cetanā vitakko vicāro cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhi vīriyabalaṃ samādhibalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ uddhaccaṃ moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ samatho paggāho avikkhepo;
ds2.1.6:77.3: ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā ṭhapetvā vedanākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā saññākkhandhaṃ ṭhapetvā viññāṇakkhandhaṃ—
ds2.1.6:77.4: ayaṃ tasmiṃ samaye saṅkhārakkhandho hoti … pe …
